name: calendar
description: Commands for creating and modifying calendars

options.name: view
options.description: Provides info and a link to the Guild's calendar

options.name: overview
options.description: Whether to display the next 15 upcoming events in the response (default true)

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar to display. Defaults to 1

options.name: list
options.description: Lists all calendars owned by the guild

options.name: create
options.description: Starts the calendar creation wizard

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new calendar

options.name: description
options.description: The description of the new calendar

options.name: timezone
options.description: The timezone of the new calendar

options.name: host
options.description: The 3rd party host for the calendar

options.name: name
options.description: Sets the calendar's name in the wizard

options.name: name
options.description: The new name of the calendar

options.name: description
options.description: Sets the calendar's description in the wizard

options.name: description
options.description: The new description of the calendar

options.name: timezone
options.description: Sets the calendar's timezone in the wizard

options.name: timezone
options.description: The new timezone of the calendar

options.name: review
options.description: Displays the properties of the calendar in the wizard

options.name: confirm
options.description: Commits the changes made in the wizard

options.name: cancel
options.description: Cancels the wizard

options.name: delete
options.description: Deletes the calendar

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar to delete. Defaults to 1

options.name: edit
options.description: Edits an existing calendar

options.name: calendar
options.description: The calendar to edit. Defaults to 1
